column1: Smoque BBQ////I had been meaning to try out Smoque BBQ for weeks but there was always such a long line! Long lines tend to mean great food though so eventually my roommate and I decided to suck it up and go. Boy were we glad we did! The line actually moved quite quickly
column2: it's just constantly growing. The service was great and the perfect blend. You place your order at the counter and someone will seat you. Then
column3: they let you know when your food is ready and you go pick it up at the counter and take it back to your table. When they called me
column4: majority of my order was ready except one thing. They offered me a free cornbread to apologize for the wait and said they'd bring the last thing to my table. It was a nice
